name: h3
description: Introducing the 2025 Demarini Whisper Drop 10 Fastpitch Softball Bat, a game-changer in the world of fastpitch softball. With its balanced swing feel and drop 10 length-to-weight ratio, this bat is certified for USSSA, USA Softball (ASA), NSA, ISA, and WBSC play. The innovative Amplified Gapped Wall Technology and Continuous Fiber Composite Barrel enhance performance and sound, while the Composite Trumpet Handle minimizes vibrations and boosts power. The Anomaly Connection ensures seamless energy transfer, and the Anamoly End Cap optimizes barrel production, all wrapped in a stylish white, grey, and bronze colorway. Experience unmatched durability and power with this cutting-edge bat from the Demarini Whisper series. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
